item.description:
This is the beginning of May - TCI Founder's month.
Come join us as we raise a glass and toast our TCI Founder, Kae Sumner Einfeldt.

We'll fire up the grill and have a picnic like dinner. What is YOUR favorite picnic food?

After dinner, we'll have our meeting and plan our new calendar... so bring your summer event ideas and your vacation schedule...

Call us to RSVP
Linda & Ralph
860-635-7622
item.name: Dinner and a Meeting
